description: Ecobot is an innovative initiative that combines recycling with green advertising. It operates machines that collect recyclable materials, rewarding users with discount vouchers. The business model focuses on providing advertising space for companies committed to sustainability, generating income while promoting eco-friendly practices. By partnering with recycling associations, Ecobot also supports local waste pickers, enhancing community engagement. Their goal is to expand both nationally and internationally, fostering a culture of recycling and environmental responsibility.
name: Ecobot
